n0:runOracleScript.n0:source: COMMENT ON COLUMN "DWH_CON"."CHIN_INVOICELINE"."INVOICE_LINE_CODE" IS 'The invoice line is het invoice code concatenated with | concatenated with invoice line id.'; COMMENT ON COLUMN "DWH_CON"."CHIN_INVOICELINE"."INVOICE_CODE" IS 'see Invoice, Invoice Code for details';
